Title: Includes the alternative and complementary integration and application of scientific principles in the scope of the practice of dietetics and nutrition
Summary: Includes the alternative and complementary integration and application of scientific principles in the scope of the practice of dietetics and nutrition; provides that the primary function of a certified dietician or nutritionist shall include using nutrition for healing; further includes a certified nutrition specialist within the definition of certified dietician or certified nutritionist.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to including the alternative and complementary integration and application of scientific principles in the scope of the practice of dietetics and nutrition
